title: Luis Felipe Bortolatto da Cunha
text:
My name is Luis. I’m a consultant and researcher working at the intersection between geoinformation and planning.
On this website you will find a personal blog, with my opinion and ideas on various topics, the projects I am involved in and my curriculum vitae.
I work with R and RStudio on a daily basis, so expect to see it throughout the pages.

title: About
text: This is the contents of the about page for my blog.

title: Curriculum vitæ
text: For now, you can check my LinkedIn, ORCID, Google Scholar and Lattes (none of them is updated).

title: Projects
text: Projects will be added to this page soon.
